# Filing Procedures — Step by Step

## Florida LLC Formation

**Cost:** $125  
**Time:** 1-3 business days for online filing  
**Where:** sunbiz.org

### Before You Start — Gather This Info
- Desired LLC name (must include "LLC" or "L.L.C.")
- Principal office address (FL street address)
- Mailing address (can be same or different)
- Registered agent name
- Registered agent address (FL street address, no PO Box)
- Member name and address
- Credit card for payment

### Step-by-Step

1. Go to **sunbiz.org**
2. Click **"Start a Business"** in top menu
3. Click **"File or Register"**
4. Scroll down, click **"Florida Limited Liability Company"**
5. Click **"File Online"**

6. **Entity Name screen:**
   - Enter: `ID8Labs LLC`
   - Click "Check Name" to verify availability
   - If available, proceed

7. **Principal Place of Business:**
   - Street Address: [your Miami address]
   - City: Miami
   - State: FL
   - Zip: [your zip]

8. **Mailing Address:**
   - Same as principal OR enter different address

9. **Registered Agent:**
   - Individual Name: [your name] OR Company Name
   - Street Address: [FL street address — NO PO BOX]
   - City, State, Zip

10. **Manager/Member Information:**
    - Select "Member Managed"
    - Name: Eduardo Belaval
    - Address: [your address]
    - Title: Member

11. **Effective Date:**
    - Select specific date: January 1, 2025

12. **Review all information**
    - Double-check everything
    - Errors require amendment ($25)

13. **Payment:**
    - $125 by credit/debit card
    - Complete transaction

14. **Confirmation:**
    - Save confirmation number
    - Download Articles of Organization PDF
    - Print copy for records

### After Filing
- Document number assigned within 1-3 business days
- Articles available on sunbiz.org under your LLC name
- Proceed to EIN application

---

## EIN Application (Federal Tax ID)

**Cost:** FREE  
**Time:** Immediate (online)  
**Where:** irs.gov/ein

### Before You Start
- LLC must already be filed/formed
- Have Articles of Organization ready (for reference)
- Know your SSN
- One EIN application per responsible party per day

### Step-by-Step

1. Go to **irs.gov/businesses/small-businesses-self-employed/apply-for-an-employer-identification-number-ein-online**
   - Or Google "IRS EIN online application"

2. Click **"Apply Online Now"**

3. Click **"Begin Application"**

4. **Select Entity Type:**
   - Click "View Additional Types, Including Tax-Exempt and Governmental Organizations"
   - Select **"Limited Liability Company (LLC)"**
   - Click Continue

5. **LLC Information:**
   - Number of members: 1
   - State: Florida
   - Click Continue

6. **Why are you applying?**
   - Select "Started a new business"
   - Click Continue

7. **Responsible Party:**
   - This is you (the member)
   - Name: [your full legal name]
   - SSN: [your SSN]
   - Role: Owner

8. **LLC Details:**
   - Legal name: ID8Labs LLC
   - Trade name (DBA): Leave blank unless using one
   - Address: [your principal business address]

9. **Business Details:**
   - Type of business: Other (or most appropriate)
   - Principal activity: Software development
   - Start date: January 1, 2025

10. **Review and Submit**
    - Verify all information
    - Submit application

11. **Receive EIN:**
    - EIN displayed immediately on screen
    - Save/print confirmation (CP 575)
    - This is your official EIN letter

### Important Notes
- Save CP 575 — banks require it
- EIN is permanent, never changes
- If you lose CP 575, can get verification letter from IRS

---

## Florida Annual Report

**Cost:** $138.75  
**Due:** May 1 every year  
**Late Fee:** $400 (total becomes $538.75)  
**Where:** sunbiz.org

### Before You Start
- Have your document number ready (from Articles of Organization)
- Verify all current information is accurate
- Credit card for payment

### Step-by-Step

1. Go to **sunbiz.org**

2. Click **"Annual Reports"** in top menu

3. Click **"File Annual Report"**

4. Enter your **Document Number** (from Articles of Organization)
   - Format: L25000XXXXXX (starts with L, year, then numbers)

5. **Verify Entity Information:**
   - Confirm entity name
   - Confirm FEI/EIN number

6. **Principal Address:**
   - Verify or update
   - Must be current

7. **Mailing Address:**
   - Verify or update

8. **Registered Agent:**
   - Verify name and address
   - Update if changed
   - Remember: FL street address required

9. **Member/Manager Information:**
   - Verify names and addresses
   - Add/remove as needed

10. **Review all information**
    - Everything accurate?
    - Changes will be reflected publicly

11. **Payment:**
    - $138.75 by credit/debit card
    - Complete transaction

12. **Confirmation:**
    - Save confirmation number
    - Download filed report
    - LLC remains in good standing

### If You Miss the Deadline
- May 2-September: $400 late fee added ($538.75 total)
- September 1: Administrative dissolution begins
- Must file reinstatement if dissolved

---

## S-Corp Election (Form 2553)

**Cost:** FREE to file  
**Deadline:** March 15 of tax year (or 75 days from formation)  
**Where:** IRS (mail or fax)

### When to Consider
- Profits exceed ~$40-50k after reasonable salary
- Ready for additional payroll complexity
- CPA has reviewed your specific situation

### Before You Start
- Consult with CPA first
- Understand reasonable salary requirements
- Have LLC formation date

### Step-by-Step

1. Download **Form 2553** from irs.gov

2. Complete form:
   - Part I: Election Information
     - Name: ID8Labs LLC
     - EIN: [your EIN]
     - Address: [principal address]
     - Election effective date: [Jan 1 of tax year]
   
   - Part I continued:
     - Shareholders: Eduardo Belaval, 100%
     - Signature of shareholder

3. **Filing options:**
   - Fax: 855-887-7734 (or number for your state)
   - Mail: Address based on your state (see form instructions)

4. **Confirmation:**
   - IRS sends acceptance letter (CP261)
   - Keep for records

### After Election
- Pay yourself reasonable salary
- Set up payroll (Gusto, QuickBooks Payroll, etc.)
- File Form 1120-S annually
- Issue yourself K-1

---

## Miami-Dade Business Tax Receipt (if required)

**Note:** Check if required for your specific business type and location.

**Cost:** Varies by business type  
**Where:** Miami-Dade County Tax Collector

### When Required
- Operating business within Miami-Dade County
- Physical location or home office
- Some exemptions for certain business types

### Step-by-Step

1. Go to **miamidade.gov/taxcollector**

2. Search "Business Tax Receipt"

3. Determine if required for your business type
   - Software/consulting often exempt if home-based
   - Check specific requirements

4. If required, apply online or in person

5. Renew annually (July 1 - September 30)
